title: Mekhi Lewis is headed back to the National Finals - VT hokiesports.com
content: Mekhi Lewis is headed back to the National Finals  VT hokiesports.com
description: Virginia Tech wrestling's first national champion will look to become a two-time national champion on Saturday night. 2019 national champion Mekhi Lewis made the finals for the second time in his career by pinning No. 3 Logan Massa (MICH) in the third period of their semifinal match on Friday night. Lewis made history once again as he became Tech's first two-time finalist in program history.
